text: Love consists of one soul dwelling in two bodies
author: Aristotle

text: Why, sometimes, I've believed as many as six impossible things before breakfast
author: Lewis Carroll

text: It's a dangerous business, Frodo, going out your door.
author: Frodo Baggins. The Fellowship Of The Ring

text: Ohana means family. family means nobody gets left behind.
author: Stitch

text: the past can hurt, but the way i see it you can either run from it or learn from it.
author: Rafiki, the Lion king.
